Key Match Events: Sikander Raza took three wickets in five balls, including a hat-trick attempt
Brad Evans defended 11 runs in the final over to help Zimbabwe win
Pakistan failed to chase down 131 runs from 20 overs
Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam, the captain of Pakistan, says they should have chased down 131 but are disappointed as they are not up to the mark with the bat
Sikandar Raza is the Player of the Match
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Ervine, the skipper of Zimbabwe, says it is a special win and they felt 20-25 runs short at the start but they bowled brilliantly
Babar Azam, the captain of Pakistan, says they need to use the new ball well and are looking forward to the next match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wasim Rauf and Shadab Khan were the key performers with the ball for Pakistan
Sikandar Raza was exceptional in the middle overs for Zimbabwe
The match was a low-scoring thriller with Zimbabwe winning by 1 run
